title: Learn Or Die, “Op-Ed” 7.9.20
itunes:title: Learn Or Die, “Op-Ed” 7.9.20
description:
In episode 668, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Charla Lauriston to discuss Trump's approval rating going down in cities where the virus is spreading, Trump trying to force children back to school, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Trump Support Withering in Areas Where Virus Cases Are Rising
  2. Trump Threatens to Cut Funding to Schools That Don’t Reopen in Fall
  3. DeVos blasts school districts that hesitate at reopening
  4. IS AMERICA HEADING FOR CIVIL WAR? OF COURSE IT IS…
  5. This Little Girl Was Caught Red Handed Stealing Snacks And Tried To Get Away With It By Pretending To Be Asleep
  6. WATCH: Blockhead - What That Dictionary Do?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
